DataElement.preferredDefinition: The code that represents the language of the informed consent.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved._A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

Property.preferredDefinition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.:A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures.

Concepts.definition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.
A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CDSIC aligned NCI Standard CRFs. ghd

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The three character system of symbols and rules by which a means of communication is designated and distinguished by others.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds or conventional symbols.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2974196 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
